root.name: Chuck Yeager's Advanced Flight Trainer
root.description: The game was originally released as "Chuck Yeager's Advanced Flight Simulator", but the name was changed over a dispute from Microsoft.Available Planes include:Sopwith CamelCessna 172 SkyhawkF-16F/A-18P-51 MustangSupermarine SpitfireSR-71 BlackbirdX-1
